sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 10, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Due to limited snowfall trails are unable to be groomed at this time.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/8 and 2/9.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks run. It was fabulous today. World-class grooming 2 deep tracks, hard skate deck, beautiful.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Red and Blue loops have deep base snow , great layered grooming , and a nice skiff of new snow on top . Excellent skiing today with LF Blue

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. Trails were power-tilled and tracked on Sunday.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a beautiful mid-winter ski day at Nub's Nob. An inch of fresh snow fell yesterday and the grooming looks spectacular this morning. We are hosting a middle school meet on Birch Run this afternoon. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
